geometry.planar

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometry.planar.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rectangle, Triangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Class modeling a shape in 3 dimensional space. Objects inheriting from this class implement basic features to access the properties of the respective shape.
